title.rendered: Emergency Contact Information for U.S. Citizens

content.rendered:
In Case of Emergency

If you are an American citizen in Ghana with an emergency, you may contact us at the following number and request to speak with the U.S. Embassy Duty Officer: +233 (0) 30-274-1000. If calling from outside Ghana, please dial +233-30-274-1000.

The phone number is the same whether you are calling during business hours or after-hours.

Please note: this phone number is NOT for visa inquiries.
